item.title: [KAFKA-2253] Deadlock in delayed operation purgatory
item.description:

There's a circular wait between the removeWatchersLock and an operations intrinsic lock.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Thanks mgharat for the find, I will take a look into this right away.

Created reviewboard https://reviews.apache.org/r/35187/diff/
against branch origin/trunk

The uploaded patch fixed one issue related to deadlock: when a watch list is removed then re-added to the watchers pool concurrently while another thread tries to purge it, it could result in a circler dependency on the watcher's object lock and the remove lock, hence the dead lock. mgharat could you try to see if the patch works?

Created reviewboard https://reviews.apache.org/r/35201/diff/
against branch origin/trunk

Updated reviewboard https://reviews.apache.org/r/35201/diff/
against branch origin/trunk

Thanks guozhang for this patch. I tested this patch (it is still running on our test cluster) and I can see that mirror makers are able to produce to target clusters just fine. So we should be good.

Thanks,

Mayuresh
Thanks for all the reviews! Committed to trunk.
